name: educraft-ai
description: AI-powered course builder with interactive quizzes, progress tracking, and curated video content

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd educraft-ai-backend && npm install && cd ../educraft-ai-frontend && npm install
scripts.test: cd educraft-ai-backend && npm test && cd ../educraft-ai-frontend && npm test
scripts.lint: cd educraft-ai-backend && npm run lint && cd ../educraft-ai-frontend && npm run lint

author: samarth-07z
